      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(java.lang.String username)
         throws UserNotFoundException
        removes the user from the database given their username
        Parameters:
        username - the username to search for and delete the associated user
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - when the given username does not have an associated user in the database

      throws UserNotFoundException
        gets a user given the person object related to that user

        person - the person who user is to be found
        Returns:
        the user whose person object is passed
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - when the person passed does not have an associated user

      • getUser

      throws UserNotFoundException
        given a username, returns the User model object
        Parameters:
        username - username to search for
        Returns:
        the user with the given username
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the given username does not have an associated user
